--- title: Sampling keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Functions which sample nodes or edges in graphs" ---
{% raw %}

Node sampling¶

sample_nodes[source]

sample_nodes(G, num_nodes=1)

Uniformly samples num_nodes nodes

khop_neighbourhood[source]

khop_neighbourhood(G, node, k)

Returns the k-hop neighbourhood of node

dilate[source]

dilate(G, nodes)

Returns the union of the neighbourhood of all nodes in nodes

Edge sampling¶

sample_edges[source]

sample_edges(G, r, non_pendant=False)

Samples r edges from G

If non_pendant=True the edges sampled are not pendant

Subgraph sampling¶

khop_subgraph[source]

khop_subgraph(G, k, node=None)

Returns a subgraph of G which is the k-hop neighbourhood of some node
